text:
@realDonaldTrump NO CNN MELTDOWN - just more lies from Fox News. Trumps own words  22 Jan "we have it totally under control"
24 Feb "The coronavirus is very much under control in USA Stock Market starting to look very good to me" 25 Feb "15 Cases  within a couple of days is going down to ZERO"
